name: Friday Night Funkin (IcyBlox)
description:
Minus FNF MOD is a modification of Friday Night Funkin’ (FNF) that allows us to graphically renew the skins of most of the characters in the game, including the mother, the boyfriend and Daddy Dearest among others. Downloading and installing this MOD will give you access to a complete aesthetic renovation of several of the FNF characters.

One of the most interesting options included in Minus FNF MOD, and not included in any other MOD (as far as we know), is the option to select the boyfriend skin we want to play with, among three different skins. We will be able to choose which of the 3 skins we want at the beginning of each confrontation.

It is worth mentioning that all the skins included in this MOD are of high quality and blend perfectly with the game, giving the feeling of being original content from the developers. Although it does not have other additional content, such as songs, it could be said that we are facing one of the most complete Skins MODs of FNF (and that is why it is in the category of MODs, and not Skins, as it adds many Skins in a single installation, plus additional options.

What does Minus FNF MOD include?
  • Aesthetic renewal of the Daddy Dearest, MOM, Skid And Pump, Pico, Boyfriend and Girlfriend skins.
  • Possibility to select which skin we want to play with, being able to choose among 3 different ones.
Download Friday Night Funkin Minus FNF MOD NOW!
